DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-029
DataSourceDefinition.Expression: SELECT usuarios.VAL_NOMB_USUA AS idusuario, usuarios.VAL_APEL_PATE AS apellidopaterno, usuarios.VAL_APE_MATE AS apellidomaterno, usuarios.VAL_NOM1 AS nombre1, usuarios.VAL_NOM2 AS nombre2, func.VAL_I18N, 1 AS cantidad FROM V_REP_USUAR_LARGO usuarios, ( Select distinct i18.VAL_I18N, i18.OID_I18N, us.IDMEMBER as idusuario from MEN_FUNCI fu LEFT OUTER JOIN PRINCIPALS pr ON TO_CHAR(fu.OID_FUNC) = pr.NAME INNER JOIN MEMBEROF per on per.IDROLE = pr.IDPRINCIPAL INNER JOIN MEMBEROF us on per.IDMEMBER = us.IDROLE INNER JOIN V_GEN_I18N_SICC i18 on fu.OID_FUNC = i18.VAL_OID where IND_NIVE = 1 and IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% and i18.attr_enti='MEN_FUNCI') func %start_DEPARTAMENTOVALUES%, propertyvalues prop9 %end_DEPARTAMENTOVALUES% %start_MARCAVALUES%, propertyvalues prop24 %end_MARCAVALUES% %start_CANALVALUES%, propertyvalues prop25 %end_CANALVALUES% %start_EMPRESAVALUES%, propertyvalues prop30 %end_EMPRESAVALUES% %start_REGIONVALUES%, propertyvalues prop38 %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES%, propertyvalues prop39 %end_ZONAVALUES% %start_SECCIONVALUES%, propertyvalues prop40 %end_SECCIONVALUES%, users us WHERE ( us.IDUSER = usuarios.COD_USUA AND us.IDUSER(+) = func.idusuario %start_DEPARTAMENTOVALUES% AND us.iduser = prop9.idprincipal AND prop9.idproperty = 9 %end_DEPARTAMENTOVALUES% %start_MARCAVALUES% AND us.iduser = prop24.idprincipal AND prop24.idproperty = 24 %end_MARCAVALUES% %start_CANALVALUES% AND us.iduser = prop25.idprincipal AND prop25.idproperty = 25 %end_CANALVALUES% %start_EMPRESAVALUES% AND us.iduser = prop30.idprincipal AND prop30.idproperty = 30 %end_EMPRESAVALUES% %start_REGIONVALUES% AND us.iduser = prop38.idprincipal AND prop38.idproperty = 38 %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND us.iduser = prop39.idprincipal AND prop39.idproperty = 39 %end_ZONAVALUES% %start_SECCIONVALUES% AND us.iduser = prop40.idprincipal AND prop40.idproperty = 40 %end_SECCIONVALUES% ) AND ( %start_MARCAVALUES% DECODE (TO_NUMBER (prop24.stringvalue), NULL, -1, TO_NUMBER (prop24.stringvalue) ) IN (%value_MARCAVALUES%) %start_CANALVALUES% AND %end_MARCAVALUES% DECODE (TO_NUMBER (prop25.stringvalue), NULL, -1, TO_NUMBER (prop25.stringvalue) ) IN (%value_CANALVALUES%) %end_CANALVALUES% %start_EMPRESAVALUES% AND DECODE (TO_NUMBER (prop30.stringvalue), NULL, -1, TO_NUMBER (prop30.stringvalue) ) IN (%value_EMPRESAVALUES%) %end_EMPRESAVALUES% %start_DEPARTAMENTOVALUES% AND DECODE (TO_NUMBER (prop9.stringvalue), NULL, -1, TO_NUMBER (prop9.stringvalue) ) IN (%value_DEPARTAMENTOVALUES%) %end_DEPARTAMENTOVALUES% %start_REGIONVALUES%AND DECODE (TO_NUMBER (prop38.stringvalue), NULL, -1, TO_NUMBER (prop38.stringvalue) ) IN (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_SECCIONVALUES% AND DECODE (TO_NUMBER (prop40.stringvalue), NULL, -1, TO_NUMBER (prop40.stringvalue) ) IN (%value_SECCIONVALUES%) %end_SECCIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND DECODE (TO_NUMBER (prop39.stringvalue), NULL, -1, TO_NUMBER (prop39.stringvalue) ) IN (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES% %start_APELLIDOPATERNOVALUE% AND usuarios.VAL_APEL_PATE like %value_APELLIDOPATERNOVALUE% %end_APELLIDOPATERNOVALUE% %start_APELLIDOMATERNOVALUE% AND usuarios.VAL_APE_MATE like %value_APELLIDOMATERNOVALUE% %end_APELLIDOMATERNOVALUE% %start_NOMBRE1VALUE% AND usuarios.VAL_NOM1 like %value_NOMBRE1VALUE% %end_NOMBRE1VALUE% %start_NOMBRE2VALUE% AND usuarios.VAL_NOM2 like %value_NOMBRE2VALUE% %end_NOMBRE2VALUE% ) GROUP BY usuarios.VAL_NOMB_USUA, usuarios.VAL_APEL_PATE, usuarios.VAL_APE_MATE, usuarios.VAL_NOM1, usuarios.VAL_NOM2, func.VAL_I18N ORDER BY usuarios.VAL_NOMB_USUA, usuarios.VAL_APEL_PATE, usuarios.VAL_APE_MATE, usuarios.VAL_NOM1, usuarios.VAL_NOM2, func.VAL_I18N
